item.title: Why Texas Instruments’ 2026 Outlook Has Wall Street Re-Rating It
item.description: Texas Instruments is well-positioned for growth, margin strength, cash flow, and capital returns in 2026, and analysts are taking note.

item.title: NextEra Energy: Priced for Perfection, or Justified Premium?
item.description: NextEra Energy stock is trading at a 52-week high and a premium valuation; for now investors believe the company's growth outlook justifies the upside

item.title: Carvana Drops 14% After $1B Accounting Allegations
item.description: Carvana reported record revenue and profit margins while facing volatility from a short report alleging accounting irregularities at related parties.

item.title: After +50% Return in 2025, GM Gets Off to a Strong Start in 2026
item.description: General Motors just saw another big up-move after the company's latest earnings report, showing resiliency amid a soft auto market.
